summary: An armor pratical and lore friendly.
descriptionHtml:
Finally, my first armor. I have plans for other stuff in the future.
An armor pratical and lore friendly, designed for balanced fighters.
Light armor, upgradable to legendary and craftable. Stats are highter than glass armor.
Actually I was going to publish this months ago but my hard disk died, so I had to redo it.
The belt is from Dawnguard.

Update 1.3: Added craftable gloves, fixed stuff. To complete the set, use Dawnguard boots or scaled boots.
Now heavy version is avaliable! steel boots or plate boots will fit nicely.
Sadly, can't find a good helmet to use with this armor.

Thanks to BaronDavid for the retextured executioner's robes. from this mod:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2674/?
Which I tweaked a little.

Permission:
Tell me if you are going to reupload anything, and don't forget to credit.
author: Derok
